text: @Talkmaster I know you're doing your best to pick up the xenophobe slack since Hair Dump is occupied demonstrating his impotence as a leader in the COVID-19 crisis, but maybe stick with your strong suit of howling into the void, bashing Nancy Pelosi, and ripping wings off flies.
